title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (Singapore) in Jun 2023
Interview Descriptions: Interview was professional and thorough. interviewer ask many relevant questions and answered all question from myself. interview lasted 30 mins. was conducted through zoom if I'm not wrong. interview ended on good note.
Interview Questions: what is your preference, inpatient or outpatient. Why?

title: PSA Patient Service Associate Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Brief and sweet, details of jobs scoop are all explained well. the whole progress is very fast yet very effective. Kudos to HR and the agent that arrange for interview

title: Pre Registration Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer was very friendly and willing to share her experiences. The pharmacist there are very passionate about that job. The duration of the interview was about 30 minutes. The questions asked were manageable.
Interview Questions: Why do I want to join KTPH? Where do I see myself in 5 years' time?

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Best iv ever..got simple test to do..juz do it simple then pass it..best interviewer..very polite n always smile..juz be who u are..need to come again for test..after zoom iv..i am juz enter 30 words..whats else u want?
Interview Questions: Why u want to work here

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital
Interview Descriptions:
HR took awhile to reply, but the process was fast once the managers are interested in you. 

there were 2 rounds of face to face interview (precovid)

Took about 1.5months to get the offer letter.. so communication could be better
Interview Questions: Why do you want to join healthcare?

title: Health & Social Care Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital
Interview Descriptions:
Applied through an acquaintance
Sent resume and got a reply for an interview within 2 weeks
3 interviewers in total

Unpleasant interview process, 2 out of 3 interviewers were condescending, and obvious they were either not listening to the answers or already had an opinion formed
Interview Questions: Plans for 5 years down the road in this industry

title: Social Work Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (Singapore) in Apr 2022
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer is very unprofessional. From start til finish he gave unwelcoming vibes and showed that he looks very tired and not at all bothered by fidgeting around and looking elsewhere the whole time
Interview Questions: What inspired you to become a Social Work Assistant?

title: Administrative Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Okay I guess it was easy and brief. Fast. Quick. Pleasant. Overall was an okay neutral experience. Asking usual interview qn iirc cos this was many years ago. Things might have changed.

title: Medical Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital
Interview Descriptions:
Strengths and weakness, reason for choosing the job, and description of past attachment and practicum experience. Interviewer was calm and kind, and explained the role in details. 
Got called for interview within a week,
And interview process was quick and hassle free. Was interviewed by the head of department and subsequently the hr

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (Woodlands New Town, )
Interview Descriptions: The interview was relaxed and the interviewers were quite encouraging. They are mainly looking out for those who are willing to learn, has the right attitude and ok with shift works.
Interview Questions:
1. Why do you choose to work at KTPH?
2. What differentiates you from other candidates?

title: Senior Patient Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (Singapore) in Sept 2018
Interview Descriptions: There were a few other candidates that had their interviews scheduled before me. I knew that the chances of me getting selected was really low as they always have mass recruitment. Too competitive
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years

title: Research Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (Singapore)
Interview Descriptions: Got the interview through a recruiter. 3 interviewers: 1 from HR, 1 Chief investigating officer (Dr), 1 other researcher. Mainly talked about previous research experience. Not too intimidating! Required to sit for a test for proficiency in certain research skills.

title: Business Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital
Interview Descriptions: It was a comfortable interview. There will be a hr and technical round together. Was asked questions about the role I have applied for and my projects.overall had a good experience

title: Therapy Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (Singapore) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions:
Didn't got any response from applying at site or online. But when I filled application form from the HR at the hospital itself, I got contacted and offered for an interview a week after. 
Interview was with the Principal and Senior therapist of the department.
A panel style kind of interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you wish to be a therapy assistant ?

title: Patient Service Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through a staffing agency. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital
Interview Descriptions: The interview was relaxed and laid back, there were 2 interviewers present. Proper rooming was highly emphasized as part of the working environment, as well as attending to difficult situations. Interviewers asked about career goals, etc
Interview Questions: Are you comfortable with working in a stressful environment?

title: Temporary Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (Singapore) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: There was only one interview, lasted around 40 minutes. Interviewers were very friendly and did not ask much difficult questions. Mainly enquire about my qualifications, my skills, as well as how long am I able to commit to the job.
Interview Questions: Mainly asked about my qualifications, as well as my skills.

title: Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Applied for executive position and got called for interview after two weeks. 
Interview was very causal. Interviewers were very friendly and asked about your reasons for applying that particular position and your interests. Explains the job scopes and responsibilities well to let you understand better. 

Discuss about your experiences and how it helped you.
Interview Questions:
What do you look in a job?
How well is your interaction with people?

title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (Singapore) in Aug 2014
Interview Descriptions:
Panel interview. Very formal, however, informative and professional. They were able to ask pertinent questions and answer my queries accordingly. Overall it was a very efficient interview. 
The panel consists of 2 senior of the department and then 1 senior from HR.
Interview Questions:
Why did you leave your previous job?
What can you contribute to the company

title: Information Systems and Technology Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Khoo Teck Puat Hospital (Singapore) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: Simple over the phone interview where the supervisor presents the requirements of the role and evaluates your experience and qualities. Relaxed conversation with no need for being too edgy. Quite easy. Just relax and be confident with yourself and clear of what you have done in your within and outside of your university curriculum.
Interview Questions: Do you know how to get to the work place?
